constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 18 (Friday, January 28, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BIGGS:
H.R. 6514.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section VIII
[Page H308]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow an above-the-line deduction for health insurance premiums.
